extendedInfo.description: âªâªEver wondered how would life be without alphabets, the abcs? How could we speak words or send someone a message or write down a theory? It would have been nothing, no research, no science, no progress and probably no communication. We start all over with the alphabets and words when a new baby comes to life. These alphabets are the true essence of what we speak, they make words and those words make a statement. Letâs start teaching our kids through a colorful way of alphabets.â¬ The coloring page includes abc all the way till you reach z.â¬Jump into the world of colours and give life to the black and white images with nice colors!â¬âªLet your child grow his creative instincts through this fun game with a multi color brushes and unique drawings. While your toddlers or pre-school kids are busy learning to paint the lovely sketches, you have the time for yourself.â¬ âªWe have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger drawing technique. The bright colors and wonderful templates are also a source of entertainment for your babies and even your school going children. The color selection and the art of coloring with beautiful color play a distinct role in the development of cognitive, tactile and fine motor skills of your baby.â¬***Features Offered***âªâ We have provided 3 basic brush size for your kid painting art skillsâ¬âªâ Use the free tool eraser to rub off the unwanted colorâ¬âªâ A palette of 20 fun colors to make your kid paint and playâ¬âªâ An attractive music to keep him entertained while your toddler colorâ¬âªâ You have messed it up and donât feel like erasing it all? Press CLEAR ALL and the app do the cleaning job itself.â¬âªâ Save picture to the gallery/ SD cardâ¬âªYes this sounds real fun. Learn to color with us. This app features painting like the way your toddlers love. Painting is fun yet messy too. Why bundle up more work for you. Forget the real brushes and paints; skip the coloring book and drawing pads. We have a skillfully designed and complete coloring app prepared specially for your child that you can add up to the collection of your kids game. â¬âªThis app is designed for baby, Toddlers and preschool kids who loves sketching, painting, coloring and drawing with many colors.â¬***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: New version
reviews.comment: By this reviews I thought it will be not good game
reviews.author: Rishabh Majithiya

reviews.title: Ads Constantly
reviews.comment: I opened it for my son to play with and ever since then I\'ve been getting ad notifications. Uninstalled within 2 hours of using it for the first time.
reviews.author: Haley Earls

reviews.title: Pure spam
reviews.comment: Not worth crap... all it does is fill your device with false virus warnings and ads... don\'t waste your time because the \"opt out\" doesn\'t work either!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I deleted it
reviews.comment: This app and all of their apps throw a bunch of ads on your phone.. I wouldn\'t recommend it.
reviews.author: A Google User
